1065408423263698946.text: As scientists have patiently been trying to explain to you, global warming involves an upward trend in average global temperatures along with extreme regional variability on short timescales. Record-setting events are expected and don’t erase the incontrovertible worldwide trend.https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1065400254151954432 …

1065424113664212992.text: His eyes glazed over right about at "upward"

1065657801723174912.text: There's a Yiddish expression, "Like cupping (bleeding, primitive medical treatment) a dead man," applicable to any attempt to inject reason into the President's thought process (if the word "thought" can be used in this connection).

1065637385495592960.text: Anti-scientific propaganda spewed by a wannabe authoritarian dictator to prime his base.

1065449157190721537.text: Can we settle on the term “Climate Crisis” and get it through our collective head that nothing else matters? Alternatively, kiss our collective ass goodbye. Oh, and Happy Thanksgiving Day.
